bibl.title: Inventory of Compulsory Services in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali, Inventory of Compulsory Services in Ptolemaic and Roman Egypt. (American Studies in Papyrology. 3.)
New Haven - Toronto, American Society of Papyrologists, 1968, 4°, classeur à feuillets mobiles.
C.R. par J. David Thomas, JRS 60 (1970) p. 236 - Jean Bingen, ChrEg 44 (1969) No. 87, pp. 169-170 - Sergio Daris, Aegyptus 47 (1967) pp. 283-284 - Ernst Boswinkel, BibO 27 (1970) pp. 208-209.
